plot: The heiress to a powerful newspaper owner gets a job at the paper under an assumed name and helps break up a blackmail racket.
title: The Girl on the Front Page
plot_es: The heiress to a powerful newspaper owner gets a job at the paper under an assumed name and helps break up a blackmail racket.
original_name: The Girl on the Front Page
plot_en: The heiress to a powerful newspaper owner gets a job at the paper under an assumed name and helps break up a blackmail racket.
